description: Sparse storage of attributes that deviate from their initialization value.
title: Accessor Sparse

___count.gltf_detailedDescription: The number of attributes encoded in this sparse accessor.
___count.description: Number of entries stored in the sparse array.

$eref.description: Indices of those attributes that deviate from their initialization value.
$eref.title: Accessor Sparse Indices

___byteOffset.description: The offset relative to the start of the bufferView in bytes. Must be aligned.

___componentType.gltf_detailedDescription: The indices data type.  Valid values correspond to WebGL enums: `5121` (UNSIGNED_BYTE), `5123` (UNSIGNED_SHORT), `5125` (UNSIGNED_INT).

___bufferView.description: The index of the bufferView with sparse indices. Referenced bufferView can't have ARRAY_BUFFER or ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER target.

___indices.description: Index array of size `count` that points to those accessor attributes that deviate from their initialization value. Indices must strictly increase.

$eref.description: Array of size `accessor.sparse.count` times number of components storing the displaced accessor attributes pointed by `accessor.sparse.indices`.
$eref.title: Accessor Sparse Values

___byteOffset.description: The offset relative to the start of the bufferView in bytes. Must be aligned.

___bufferView.description: The index of the bufferView with sparse values. Referenced bufferView can't have ARRAY_BUFFER or ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER target.

___values.description: Array of size `count` times number of components, storing the displaced accessor attributes pointed by `indices`. Substituted values must have the same `componentType` and number of components as the base accessor.
